name: Goblin Invasion
description:
Elves are famous for their elegance, highly developed culture, high intelligence...
As well as arrogance, ambition and selfishness.
They should not have started a war, because now they are waiting for... Goblin Invasion!

Goblin Invasion is a tower defense/tower attack game where you paly as a commander of goblin forces. Summon trained warriors of different ranks and direct your attack on the monolithic towers of arrogant elves. The towers, in turn, will give decent resistance to the attacks of archers and magicians.

Game Features:
- Logic development
- Tactics training
- Visual Style
